Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: According to what people have been saying on social media there's an urgent need for the government to address social welfare issues in Australia. Many are imploring the government to increase JobSeeker and related payments to help those who are struggling to make ends meet. Pensioners have expressed solidarity with JobSeeker recipients and the government has been called upon to do more. In the upcoming budget the government will need to strike the right balance between cost of living relief and managing inflation according to comments made online.
